contents:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Schaffer,
This is a companion case of Scranton Electric Co. v. Boro. of Old Forge and Eyer & Co. v. Same, in which opinions are handed down herewith. The note for $10,000, upon which judgment in this case was entered, was originally given to Eyer & Co., as the opinion in that case will show. For the reasons there given the order of the court below refusing to interfere with the judgment is
Affirmed at appellants’ cost.
